          <title>
            <string language="fr">Périphérique TV</string>
            <string language="en">TV Remote</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fernsehapparat Entfernte Station</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Telecontrole da Tevê</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periferico della TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">TV απομακρυσμένη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Telecontrol de la TV</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Signaux infrarouges : Périphérique TV.  Animation interactive montrant l'utilisation d'une télécommande de changer un canal de télévision par l'utilisation  de l'infrarouge.</string>
            <string language="en">Infrared signals: TV remote. Interactive animation showing the use of a remote control to change a television channel by the use of infrared.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">TV</string>
            <string language="en">TV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">télécommandes</string>
            <string language="en">remote controls</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">détecteurs</string>
            <string language="en">detectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">télévision</string>
            <string language="en">television</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">transmission de l'information</string>
            <string language="en">information transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotsignale: Fernsehapparat entfernte 
Station. Interaktive Animation, die den Gebrauch von einer 
Fernbedienung zeigt, eine Fernsehenführung durch den Gebrauch von 
Infrared zu ändern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais infravermelhos: Telecontrole da 
tevê. Animation interativo que mostra o uso de um controle 
remoto mudar uma canaleta da televisão pelo uso do infrared.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali infrarossi: Periferico della TV. 
Animazione interattiva che mostra l'uso di un telecomando 
cambiare una scanalatura della televisione tramite l'uso di infrared.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρυθρα σήματα: TV απομακρυσμένη. 
Διαλογική ζωτικότητα που εμφανίζει τη χρήση ενός 
τηλεχειρισμού για να αλλάξει ένα τηλεοπτικό κανάλι με την χρήση 
των υπέρυθρων ακτίνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales infrarrojas: Telecontrol de la TV.
Animación interactiva que muestra el uso de un mando a 
distancia de cambiar un canal de la televisión por el uso del 
infrarrojo.</string>
          </description>
